title: Doggy style
summary: Doggy style is a sex position in which a person bends over, crouches on all fours (usually on hands and knees), or lies on their abdomen, for sexual intercourse, other forms of sexual penetration or other sexual activity. Doggy style is a form of a rear-entry position, others being with the receiving partner lying on the side in the spoons sex position[1] or the reverse cowgirl sex position. Non-penetrative sex in this position may also be regarded as doggy style.
